column4: I like vista. a little ram hungry but there is nothing else out there that compares to its end user capabilities
for instance and admin can right click go to properties and change permissions after a few prompts:)
superdachs: no. i'm just a user who doesn't have an agenda against one OS or another and am realistic
Vista is the best thing that ever happend to Linux ;-)
ok how so? more users using ubuntu? can't be elite then if every one uses it;)
i think sp1 will really help vista out with the few "bugs" most of us notice. a lot of improvements are going into the GUI from what i hear
Few Bugs man i can run more games in Linux Using wine then i can in Vista LOL
Agree i think WoW can easaly be build for Linux, Did you know you can get banned for running wow with wine because you run 3d party app haha
its because the "third party testing program" *don't know what else to call it* can't run in wine correctly i think
Well wow runs nice with wine i say nice as in Not great, I get about 20 fps in Linux but get 60fps in Windows
lol youa re making me want my new ram for my main system (vista). so i can play
How mutch ram you got now?
1gb with 69% used (it is not just vista by itself) i'm putting in another 2gb
lol got to love firefox, 100mb of my ram is used by that
Nice that shoul;d fix a lot. I got 4gig now and vista eats it anyway
wow what in the world do you do on it?
